Package com.zoomly.service

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.zoomly.service.ReservationService
public class ReservationService extends Object
ReservationService.java Service class for managing reservations. Provides methods to create, update, cancel, and validate reservations, as well as checking for conflicts with existing reservations.
